WorkItem.Description: I have the 4 piece bonus for T9 DPS (Koltira's) and the box for the bonus is not getting checked off in the buffs tab.  I cannon click it manually either.
WorkItem.Summary: [DPSDK] T9 Set bonus not getting checked when equipped

Comments.Message: Open each piece of your T9 in the item editor and check the "set" field. They should all say "thassarian's battlegear" or "koltira's battlegear"; make sure every piece has the same set name.
Some pieces get imported with tab/whitespace after the set name, breaking the set bonus functionality for those pieces.
I have them all set to Koltira's Battlegear and still only the 2 piece bonus is showing up.  I have 2 pieces of 232 and 2 pieces of 245 would that have an effect on the buff?
Nevermind I got it working.  There was blankspace at the end of 2 items.  Thanks for the help
